TECHNICAL TRAINING
In plant Training: Attended one month In-plant Training at Tondiarpet to get real life experience on Multistorey Building. PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE (4 YEARS)
NAME OF WORK : (765/400KV) SUB STATION, CONSTRUCTION OF RESIDENTIAL BUILDING (G+2) at THIRUVALAM.
CLIENT : POWER GRID CORPORATION OF INDIA. FIRM : KUMAR BUILDERS DESIGNATION : JUNIOR SITE ENGINEER PERIOD : JULY 2014 to JUNE 2016 JOB DESCRIPTION: 1. Ensure that field construction activities are maintained in accordance with project drawings, Specification, Schedules, Construction Budjet, Procedures, Quality Requirements and Safety Standards. 2. Site supervision/execution, checking and assuring that the construction work is as per the Project Technical Specification and Drawing’s. 3. Conversant with architect and structural drawings. 4. Broaded Knowledge in YARD P.C.C and METAL SPREADING (765kv/400kv) at Thiruvalam Substation. 5. Taking Sewerage line from Buildings with well-connecting chambers to Septic Tank. 6. Co-ordinate with sub-contractors for smooth flow of work. 7. Inspecting and Checking the Materials prior to their use at site as per sample approved by Consultant. 8. Monitoring daily progress of site. 9. Preparing running account bills. 10. Preparing Weekly and Monthly Progress report to be submitted to the project director and Consultants. 11. Ensuring that all work is done without wastage of Materials.
NAME OF WORK : DEVELOPMENT OF HUBALI AIRPORT (CONSTRUCTION OF NEW TERMINAL BUILDING ATC TOWER cum TECHNICAL BLOCK cum FIRE STATION, SUB-STATION AND OTHER ANCILLARY BUILDINGS AND SERVICES at HUBALI.
CLIENT : AIRPORT AUTHORITY OF INDIA. FIRM : LOGOS CONSTRUCTION PRIVATE LIMITED DESIGNATION : SITE ENGINEER PERIOD : JUNE 2016 to SEPTEMBER 2017
Job Responsibilities:
1.Setting out the work in accordance with the drawing and specification.
2.Checking materials and work in progress for compliance with the specified requirements.
3.Observance of safety requirements, persuade all labors to wear the safety gadgets 4.Quality control in accordance with method statements, quality plans and inspection and test plans 5.Preparing of measurement books
6.Maintaining of rain records, Hindrance register, site instruction report 7. Prepare and maintaining of checklist for all work procedures at site
8.Preparation of bar bending scheduled as per GFC. 9.Evaluate and monitor all subcontractors’ performance.
10.Keep a trace of subcontractors, equipments productivities.11.Schedule the work plan for projected week.
12.Monitor the subcontractor’s performance daily and record it.
13.Supervising and ensuring the sufficient labor deployment to achieve the day to day target.
14.Work done measurement updating for labor payments.
15.Providing data in respect of variation, orders, and site instructions.
16.Preparing and record drawings, technical reports, site diary.
NAME OF WORK : (400/220KV) SUB STATION, TOWER FOUNDATIONS, STANDARD PREFABRICATED R.C.C BOUNDARY WALL, R.C.C ROAD and OFFICE BUILDING in PAVAGADA, TUMKUR DISTRICT. KARNATAKA.
CLIENT : POWER GRID CORPORATION OF INDIA. FIRM : AAKAR GROUPS DESIGNATION : SITE ENGINEER PERIOD : FROM SEPTEMBER 2017 (CURRENTLY WORKING).
JOB DESCRIPTION: 1. Ensure that field construction activities are maintained in accordance with project drawings, Specification, Schedules, Construction Budget, Procedures, Quality Requirements and Safety Standards. 2. Taking land Survey by Rise and fall method to get Average F.G.L for Excavation work of Boundary wall. 3. Preparing B.B.S for column and panel slabs. 4. Inspecting and Checking the Materials prior to their use at site as per sample approved by Consultant. 5. Monitoring daily progress of site. 6. Preparing running account bills. 7. Preparing Weekly and Monthly Progress report to be submitted to the project director and Consultants. SOFTWARES KNOWN
